function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disrupted supply chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with international travel and interaction with global urban academics and professionals.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Machine learning prediction of infection and severity risk for covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quasi-steady state assumption may lead to inaccurate estimation of emission rates, causing potential misinterpretation of data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ecological fallacy risk due to population-weighted assessments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Media reports can fuel fear related to contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untimely creation of risk maps for elimination programmes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Two-part model for analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases within the group of contributors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comfort and efficiency","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unpredictable park visitation trends during covid-19 lockdowns and restrictions may result in challenges for public health planning and resource allocation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing mobile application in a smaller clinic may result in potential exposure to contagious diseases for the operators and patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased household electricity consumption due to extended time spent at home during quarantine","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of covid-19 through the deployment and use of the cvid-19 digital signage system in public spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists avoiding high-risk areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gas-based ovens in kuwait contribute to indoor air quality challenges and may pose a risk if not properly ventilated.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability to natural hazards","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Questioning the assumption that access control effectively prevents the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Operational changes for retailers to operate under social distancing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusive design for a diversified range of activities can lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and preventing disease transmission across different areas of the health club facilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relational interaction capability may lead to close physical contact between businesses and risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing artificial intelligence and image processing technology for medical diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative association between the number of parks and park visit changes during covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective control of virus spread in public places","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workplace classification of high-risk
